backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that manages user profiles keyed by Principal, with query and update methods guarded by access-control permissions and admin checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change on the Today page after saving a promise, including affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map providing high-level summaries of key frontend source files, pages, hooks, utilities, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and base styles defining a monochrome theme, color tokens, layout defaults, and optional dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, favicon, root mount node, and loads the React application bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that switches between onboarding, loading, and authenticated Today views based on Internet Identity session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, handling authenticated vs anonymous identities and initializing access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, managing login, logout, persisted identities, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useRotatingPromiseSug: UI hook that cycles through predefined promise suggestions with timed fade-out and fade-in visibility transitions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global frontend styles importing Google fonts, configuring a light-only Tailwind theme, typography, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file that initializes the QueryClient, wraps the app with InternetIdentity and React Query providers, and mounts to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Onboarding screen that handles Internet Identity login and an optional animated carousel explaining the product before authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Today.tsx: Implements the Today page where a user creates a single daily promise, persists it locally, and then views a locked, non-editable state with reflection placeholders; also handles logout, error states, and rotating suggestion prompts.
frontend/src/utils/todayPromiseStorage.t: Provides localStorage utilities to save, retrieve, validate-by-date, and clear the user's daily promise with basic error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Defines helpers for reading URL parameters from query strings or hash routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and safely clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, plugins, and an extended theme with custom colors, typography, animations, and layout tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks the high-level product description, implemented features, versions, and outstanding feature requests for the One Promise application.
